NAME: neovim
DESCRIPTION: Fork of Vim aiming to improve user experience, plugins and GUIs

NAME: zsh-syntax-highlighting
DESCRIPTION: Fish shell like syntax highlighting for Zsh

NAME: fd
DESCRIPTION: Simple, fast and user-friendly alternative to find

NAME: ripgrep
DESCRIPTION: Fast search tool inspired by ag and grep

NAME: xsv
DESCRIPTION: Fast CSV toolkit written in Rust

NAME: bat
DESCRIPTION: Cat(1) clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration

NAME: tealdeer
DESCRIPTION: Very fast implementation of tldr in Rust

NAME: pulsemixer
DESCRIPTION: CLI and curses mixer for Pulseaudio

NAME: i3-gaps
DESCRIPTION: Improved tiling window manager - i3 fork with more features

NAME: i3status-rust
DESCRIPTION: Replacement for i3status, written in Rust

NAME: xsel
DESCRIPTION: Command-line getting and setting the contents of the X selection

NAME: xcape
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to use a single press of a modifier key as another key

NAME: picom
DESCRIPTION: Lightweight compositor for X11 (previously a compton fork)

NAME: feh
DESCRIPTION: Fast and light imlib2-based image viewer

NAME: adwaita-qt
DESCRIPTION: Style to bend Qt applications to look like they belong into GNOME Shell

NAME: zathura
DESCRIPTION: Highly customizable and functional document viewer

NAME: shellcheck
DESCRIPTION: Static analysis tool for shell scripts

NAME: starship
DESCRIPTION: Minimal, fast and customizable cross-shell prompt
